authors.name: Nicholas Feasey
authors.affiliation: Malawi Liverpool Wellcome Trust Clinical Research Program, Blantyre, Malawi

authors.name: Jonathan  Rigby
authors.affiliation: Malawi Liverpool Wellcome Trust Clinical Research Program, Blantyre, Malawi

before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"4dg7p","text":"Ensure that you wear appropriate PPE whilst sampling (e.g. gloves, appropriate footwear, disposable lab coat, facemask). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3qrff","text":"A protocol for the collection of environmental samples (sewage and wastewater) using grab sampling and membrane filtration. This is part of a set of protocols for environmental surveillance of Salmonella Typhi. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":193,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9f03v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6n6cj","text":"1L of sewage or wastewater is collected then filtered under a vacuum to capture the bacteria on filter discs ready for DNA extraction. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e27hq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mq99","text":"This protocol is adapted from the method described in Rigby et al (2021).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":60,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"4bq4h","text":"Please note, the author list is in alphabetical order and does not reflect contribution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"5dc2i","text":"It is recommended that sampling be done in the morning.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
manuscript_citation: Rigby J, Elmerhebi E, Diness Y, Mkwanda C, Tonthola K, Galloway H, MIles R, Henrion M, Edwards T, Gauld J, Msefula C, Johnston R, Nair S, Feasey N, Elviss N (2021), Optimized methods for detecting Salmonella Typhi in the environment using validate field sampling, culture and confimratory molecular approaches. Journal of Applied Microbiology, doi: 10.1111/jam.15237
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"4lnh5","text":"Ringer's lactate solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bkoi1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fsnur","text":"Bucket/container with 1L capacity","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2eshj","text":"Membrane filtration apparatus","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8d8e7","text":"47mm 0.45um filter discs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jigf","text":"Coffee filters (if necessary)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aoilv","text":"Whirl-Pak bags","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a06ci","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ek8gc","text":"Appropriate PPE and disinfenctants","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9lda0","text":"Using a bucket or another method, fill a 1L collection container with sewage or wastewater and securely close the container.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6jsbt","text":"Upon receipt in the lab the sample should be stored at 4-8ºC until filtration","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gg9h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4se9u","text":"Assemble the membrane filtration apparatus according to the manufacturer's instructions","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"832pk","text":"Measure the sample into a large, sterile graduated cylinder","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8brm4","text":"Wipe the outside of the collection container with disinfectant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9fup1","text":"Place a 47mm 0.45µM filter disc on the filtration unit head and attach the filtration unit cup.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"mgti","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bj8l4","text":"If necessary, place a coffee filter on top of the cup as a pre-filter to remove any larger solid matter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9noig","text":"Place the container in a cold container with ice packs for transport back to the laboratory","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7lohv","text":"Place any disposable items in a biohazard bag for disinfection and disposal. Place any reusable items into a biohazard bag for return to the library and disinfection. Sanitise hands with hand sanitiser.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"30okn","text":"Pour sample into the filtration cup and turn on the vacuum to allow sample to slowly filter through the disc for 1 hour.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3j5i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dm8o7","text":"If the filter becomes clogged, pipette the remaining sample back into the measuring cylinder, and replace the filter disc and coffee filter with fresh filters. Repeat as necessary with up to 5 filters.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7055p","text":"Using sterile forceps, transfer the filter discs to a small WhirlPak bag, add 10ml of Ringer's lactate and then seal the bag shut","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9r4dh","text":"Elute the filter discs by massaging the bag until the filters are clean or have fallen apart","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f6067","text":"Pipette 1ml of the eluate into a 1.5ml microcentrifuge tube and centrifuge at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e3h9d","text":"Pipette off the supernatant and store the pellet at -20ºC until DNA extraction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eahur","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":600,"guid":"3088CC2055C211EBA94357E405D43BF4","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bkkf8","text":"Thoroughly disinfect membrane filtration cups and measuring cylinders after use to avoid cross contamination of samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Environmental  Grab Sampling and Membrane Filtration

versions.title: Environmental  Grab Sampling and Membrane Filtration
